marklogic.body: This most evil hijacker of the White house, who bowed literally to the Saudi king when he first got elected (imagine such unacceptable TREASON !) America, the land of the free now being Burned bit by bit by these Islam-Saudi worshipping TRAITORS (and those Americans who voted for them are as treacherous as these two evil traitors - by the way, donâ€™t forget 9/11 terrorists are mostly Saudis and one of the main backers for Ground Zero Jihadist victory mosque is the Saudi royal, Prince Al-Waleed bin Talal, a nephew of the Saudi king. who now owns the biggest share of Fox News â€“ see www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=129584557)! Why is there no investigation being opened for all the War Crimes committed by these two traitors, Obama and Hillary in supporting and arming like terrorists themselves, the footsoldiers of the Saudi-Qatar kings, the Nazi-like Muslim Brotherhood-led terrorist rebellion in OIL-RICH Tunisia, Egypt and Libya, thus replacing their depleting oil and hence, sustaining their global dominant political power, including by increasing Arabizing OIL-RICH non-Arab Islamic-ruled world such as Malaysia, Mindanao, Indonesia, Nigeria, Ivory Coast, North Sudan and so on?!
